full_summary:
### **Competitive RFP for Architecture and Engineering Consultancy Services**
### Modernization of St-Bernard-de-Lacolle Port of Entry

#### Tenders are Invited for the following Contract:

Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), in collaboration with Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC), aims to modernize the border crossing infrastructure at St-Bernard-de-Lacolle Port of Entry, located in Quebec.

The procurement involves the selection of an architecture and engineering consultant to complete the modernization project as per Annex E. Successful bidders will be awarded a contract based on the best combined rating for both technical merit and price.

**Key Details:**

* List of required supporting documentation and bid submission guidelines is available on the Public Services and Procurement Canada website.
* Bids must be submitted electronically by April 28, 2023, at the latest (2:00 PM EDT).
* Only bids submitted before the deadline will be considered.
* Late or non-responsive bids will be disqualified.

**Business Opportunities:**

Trade Agreement Eligibility:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement 
* And more (refer to section in the full document)

Regions of Delivery: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

**How to Get the Document:**

A full document can be found on the following Ariba Discovery link: [insert document link]

For More Information or Clarifications, please contact Girard, Isabelle at isabelle.girard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
